GET /.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /projects.description: serves an array of all projects. Each project is represented as an object, with properties to provide information to the user

projects.name: NC Games - Backend
projects.description: This is the backend for a (mock) board games review site, it was made using express. It was made as part of the Northcoders bootcamp, during week 7 of the course

projects.name: Mandelbrot fractal pattern - Changing power
projects.description: This generates a fractal pattern based on the Mandelbrot fractal, and replots for various different indices, it then uses these images to generate a video showing how the power affects the fractal

GET /projects/python.description: serves an array of any projects which use Python as the programming language. Each project is represented as an object, with properties to provide information to the user

projects.name: Fractal pattern
projects.description: This is a mathematical model which creates a fractal pattern

projects.name: Handwriting recognition - Neural network
projects.description: This uses a neural network (trained on the MNIST dataset) in order to recognise handwritten numbers. It is coded from scratch, and doesn't use machine learning software packages.

GET /projects/javascript.description: serves an array of any projects which use Javascript as the programming language. Each project is represented as an object, with properties to provide information to the user

projects.name: NC Games - Backend
projects.description: This is the backend for a (mock) board games review site, it was made using express. It was made as part of the Northcoders bootcamp, during week 7 of the course

projects.name: NC Games - Frontend
projects.description: This is the frontend for a (mock) board games review site, it was made using React and uses the 'NC Games - Backend' project to provide the data to populate the site. Users can also upvote and post comments

GET /projects/matlab.description: serves an array of any projects which use MATLAB as the programming language. Each project is represented as an object, with properties to provide information to the user

projects.name: Vicsek model of bird flocking
projects.description: This attempts to simulate animal flocking patterns using a time step method and a simple set of flocking rules (outlined in a paper by Vicsek)

projects.name: Mandelbrot fractal pattern - Changing power
projects.description: This generates a fractal pattern based on the Mandelbrot fractal, and replots for various different indices, it then uses these images to generate a video showing how the power affects the fractal
